_comments.github: Configure which repositories the bot monitors and updates
_comments.reddit: Settings for posting and managing Reddit content. postTitle is used to identify bot posts.
_comments.messages: Text formats for GitHub releases and Reddit post updates.
_comments.skipContent: Defines tags for tutorial/comment blocks to be removed before posting.
_comments.feedback: Rules for analyzing Reddit comments and updating the post status.
_comments.timing: Controls the adaptive polling interval for the comment checker (in seconds).

messages.releaseDescription: Automated release of the pre-patched `{{asset_name}}` file. All boolean values have been set to true.
messages.outdatedPostFormat: **Status:** OUTDATED. A new version is available: [{{new_post_title}}]({{new_post_url}})
